470: speaker
portraits
msg
Hoho~ You learned it very fast~
嗯嗯~不愧是被她们看上的人，你学得还挺快嘛~
うんうん、さすが選ばれただけの事はありますね。飲み込みが早いです。
응응, 역시 선택받은 데는 이유가 있네요. 이해가 빨라요.
Mm-hmm, it's no wonder you're the chosen one. You're a quick learner.
speaker
portraits
msg
Of course! I'm full of power now!
那是当然！我感觉自己已经没有什么好怕的了！还有什么测试尽管来吧！
当然でしょ！もう怖いものなしって感じがするわ。どんなテストでもかかってきなさい！
당연하지! 이제 무서울 게 없어. 어떤 시험이라도 덤벼봐!
Obviously! I feel like I have nothing to fear now. Bring on any challenge!
speaker
portraits
msg
Beat those zombies! I will go home now~
那你就自己一个人去战斗吧~我可要先走了哦~
じゃあ、おひとりで戦ってください。私はお先に失礼しますね
그럼, 혼자서 싸우세요. 저는 먼저 실례할게요.
Well then, you go fight by yourself. I'll be off now.
speaker
portraits
msg
Ha!? You won't fight with me?
诶？！你要走了么？
え！？もう行っちゃうの？
에!? 벌써 가는 거야?
Huh?! You're leaving already?
speaker
portraits
msg
I have other works~
不然呢，我好歹也是有自己的工作的诶~这只是兼职！兼职你懂吗？
ええ、こっちと掛け持ちなので本来の仕事に戻らないといけません。わかります？
네, 여기랑 겸업이라 원래 일로 돌아가야 해요. 이해하시죠?
Yeah, I have to go back to my regular job; this is just my side job. Alright?
speaker
portraits
msg
How can you leave me alone here?
那你怎么能这样就走了呢，明明什么都没有跟我讲清楚……
それにしたって帰るの早すぎでしょ、何も説明してくれてないじゃない。わかる？
그래도 가는 건 너무 빠른 거 아니야, 아무 설명도 안 해줬잖아. 이해가 돼?
Even so, you're leaving too early and you didn't even explain anything to me.
msg
New equipment… I feel I'm just like a laboratory rat.
一上来就扔给我一套新装备，然后还拿我做了小白鼠，实验这些东西的性能……
やって来るなり新装備を投げて寄こして、人を実験台にみたいにして性能を試して……横暴よ！
와서는 갑자기 새 장비를 던져주고, 사람을 실험대 취급하듯 성능을 시험하고… 횡포야!
As soon as you arrived, they threw new equipment at me to test performance like a guinea pig... How tyrannical!
speaker
portraits
msg
Well~ Don't be mad~ You can keep this equipment. If you need powerful equipment, please take a visit of my shop~
好啦好啦，别生气了~这些装备就当做补偿送给你好了。虽然是有一些小瑕疵啦~如果你想要一些更强力的装备的话请来我的商店……
あらあら、怒らないで？お詫びにその装備は差し上げますから。ちょっと傷がありますけどね。もっと強力な装備が欲しければ「武器屋」までお越しくださいね
아이고, 화내지 마? 사과의 의미로 그 장비는 드릴게요. 좀 흠집이 있긴 하지만. 더 강력한 장비를 원하시면 「무기점」까지 오세요.
Oh dear, don't be mad, will you? I'll let you keep the equipment as an apology. It's a little beat-up though. If you want more powerful equipment, come to the "Weapon Shop".
speaker
portraits
msg
Stop the advertisement now!
喂！不要公然为自己的商店打广告啊！
ちょっと！なに当たり前のようにお店の宣伝してんの！
잠깐! 뭐가 당연하다는 듯이 가게 홍보하는 거야!
Hey! Why are you advertising your store as if it's a given?!
speaker
portraits
msg
Ahahaha~ Sorry about that~
啊哈哈~抱歉抱歉，这只是职业习惯而已，不要在意~不要在意~
あは、すいません。商売柄みなさんに宣伝をしないと。うふふ～
아하, 죄송해요. 장사하는 입장이라 여러분께 홍보를 안 할 수가 없어요. 우후훗~
Ahah, sorry. Because of my business, I have to advertise to everyone. Ufufu~

portraits
msg
*Sound of firing*
突突突突突突
バババババババ……
바바바바바바바…
Choppa-choppa-choppa... (TN: I have no clue how to write that to make people understand it's a helicopter...)
speaker
portraits
msg
Ahhh~ Time to say goodbye~ See you next time~ Kiana~
啊啦，这直升机可真是的，把人家的头发都吹乱了啦~琪亚娜，我们后会有期，拜拜~
もうこのヘリったら、セットした髪が乱れてしまいます。キアナ、次は「武器屋」で会いましょう
정말, 이 헬기라니까! 셋팅한 머리가 흐트러져 버리잖아. 키아나, 다음에는 「무기 상점」에서 보자
If stay here any longer, my hairstyle will get messed up by the helicopter. Well, then, Kiana, see you again at the "Weapon Shop".
speaker
portraits
msg
See you!
嗯！再见！
崩壊娘！私の為にちゃんとレアな武器を準備しておきなさいよ？じゃあまたね！
붕괴녀! 나를 위해 제대로 레어 무기 준비해둬! 그럼 또 보자!
Honkai Girl! Make sure you prepare a rare weapon for me, okay? See you later!
speaker
portraits
msg
Ahh… I won't take the job as a babysitter if the salary is not high…
唉……这次的任务真是的~不是报酬还算不错，谁愿意来当保姆啊……
はぁ……今回の任務は疲れました。報酬がなかったら、誰がおこちゃまの世話なんか……
하아… 이번 임무는 정말 지쳤어. 보상이 없었으면, 누가 꼬맹이 돌봐주겠어…
Sigh... This job is tiring. If there's no payment, who would babysit these kids...
speaker
portraits
msg
I still can hear you!!!
直升机还没起飞好吧！你说的话我全都听见了喂！
ちょっと！ヘリはまだ飛んでないからね！？今の話、みんなに聞こえちゃったんだから！次に会う時、ちゃんとお詫びしなさいよ！？
잠깐! 헬기는 아직 안 떴다고!? 방금 말 다 들렸어! 다음에 만날 땐 제대로 사과해!
Hey! The helicopter hasn't even taken off yet! Everyone heard what you just said! Next time we meet, you better give a formal apology, alright?!
471: I want to… check things upstairs and pray there as well. Although we missed the best time…
我想…上去看看，顺便参拜一下。虽然早已经错过新年参拜的时日了……
I want to... go up and take a look, and pay my respects to the shrine. Although I've already missed the New Year's visit...
We are just carrying out a task today… Nevermind, it won't take us too long.
但是我们只是来这里执行任务的说……算啦，如果只是参拜的话应该也不需要多少时间，只要不被发现就好啦~
But we're just here to carry out a mission... Never mind. If it's just a visit, it shouldn't take too long. As long as we don't get caught, it'll be fine.
Why do you want to do that?
芽衣为什么会想着在这里参拜呢？神社不是到处都有吗？
Why do wanna visit the shrine here, Mei? Aren't there shrines everywhere?
这就是一个很长的故事了呢……
472: I have a strange feeling when I get back to this place again…
再次回到这个地方，不知为何，总有种物是人非的感觉……
Coming back to this place again, I don't know why, but it feels like everything and everyone has changed...
Mei, you think too mcuh, let's gp!
芽衣你想太多了啦，我们快去参拜吧！
Mei, you're overthinking things. Let's just hurry to the shrine!
话说这里还真是冷清呢。
It's strange, what are you saying, I can't understand you?
奇怪，也没有发烧啊……怎么就开始说胡话了呢？
It's strange, you don't have a fever... Why'd you start talking nonsense?
There was a Houkai impact here, so we can't find any person.
这地方可是发生了崩坏诶，当然不会有人的啦~
This place has succumbed to the Honkai, so of course no one is here~
Seems there are some people here~
看来还是会有人来参拜的嘛~
It seems that there's still people coming to visit~
这不科学，现在都不是参拜的时候，更何况长空市已经无人生还了，怎么可能……
This is literally unscientific. Now isn't the time to pay homage. Moreover, no one survived in Nagazora. How could this be possible...
Let's go to check it out!
Wouldn’t we know for sure if we just follow them?
473: It's boring since I became the No.1 in the world. Kurokaede, Shirosakura, do you have the same feeling?
自天下无敌手之后，这乐趣便也少了许多。黑枫小姐，白樱小姐，你们一直跟着在下也不会腻么？
Ever since I became invincible, the fun has diminished considerably. Lady Shirosakura, Lady Kurokaede, aren't you tired of following me around everywhere?
能够跟随芽衣殿下行走天下。
Being able to travel around the world with Lady Mei is a pleasure.
It's more funny compare to stay at Izu.
总比一直呆在伊豆要有趣得多。
It's much more interesting than staying in Izu all the time.
哈哈哈…二位既然这么说，是在下的荣幸。
Hahahaha... Since you two say so, it is my honor.
I'm just a ronin. The only thing I'm interested in is fight…
可是在下只是空有这一身武艺的浪人，也只有战斗能挑起在下的兴趣了……
But I am just a ronin with nothing but martial arts skills, and only fighting can arouse my interest...
We can take to enjoy the mountain and sea.
那倒不如换我姐妹二人带领大人游山玩水如何？
How about letting the two of us take you on a sightseeing tour?
虽然我们也不过只是长居家门而不出的除妖师，就怕……
Even though we're just demon hunters who stay at home all the time, we're afraid...
I'm glad to do that. Oh, it's a shrine, let's take a rest there.
二位小姐有这份心，在下已经心满意足了。前方应该就是此地的神社，我们前去那休息一番吧。
I'm quite pleased that you two ladies are so kind. The shrine should be up ahead. Let's go there and rest for a while.
Oh, she is…Hokushin Mei… What is she doing here?
那个人是…北辰芽衣……她怎么会出现在这里？
That person is... Hokushin Mei... Why is she here?
Ah, are we going back to the ancient again?
难道我们再次回到了古代？
Are we back in ancient times again?
我们追上去问个清楚吧。
Let’s catch up and find out.
474: I felt there was someone following us. It's you…
从刚才就察觉了后面有人跟着了，不过居然是你……
I've noticed someone following me a while back, but turns out it's you...
Hokushin Mei… Glad to meet you again.
北辰小姐，我们又见面了。
Long time no see, little girl.
真是好久不见，传承了“北辰一刀流”的雷电家的小娃娃。
It’s been a long time since I saw you, young woman from the Raiden family who inherited the "Hokushin Ittou-ryuu" art.
What are you doing here with Kurokaede and Shirosakura?
北辰小姐为何会出现在这里？而且还和黑枫白樱她们在一起？
Why are you here, Hokushin-san? And why are you with Kurokaede and Shirosakura?
还有那两个，她们不是已经死掉了嘛。
And those two, aren’t they supposed to be dead?
What are you saying? We have travelled for monthes. Why do you say they were dead?
你在说什么胡话？我和两位小姐已经结伴同行数月，你却说两位小姐已经死去？
What nonsense are you talking about? I have been traveling with these two ladies for months, and you say they are dead?
Wait a second, I need to teach them a lesson.
等一下，芽衣殿下，这种程度的敌人的话，还是让我们自己来教训教训吧。
Wait a minute, Lady Mei. For an enemy of this level, let us teach them a lesson ourselves.
I don't like their words about us.
毕竟有人说我们已经死去了，心中还是有些不快的。
After all, you said we were already dead. That leaves a bitter taste in my heart.
Hey! We just said the truth.
喂！你们怎么不分青红皂白就要打啊，我只是说了实话而已啊！
Hey! Why are you attacking us without knowing the full truth? I was just being honest!
You still dare to talk nonsense. Watch yourself!
475: Nevermind, they become much stronger than before.
没事，黑枫小姐不需要道歉。是她们变强了。
It's okay, you need to apologize, Lady Kurokaede. They've become stronger.
她不会有事的，北辰一刀流和其他孱弱的剑法不一样。
She will be fine. Hokushin Ittou-ryuu is different from other weak sword techniques.
I'm fine, Kiana, don't worry about me.
我没事，琪亚娜，让你担心了。
I don't know why you said that to us, but if you want to find the answer, maybe you can check the shrine.
小辈，虽然在下不知道汝为什么会对我们的存在感到质疑，但是汝想搜寻的答案可能就在上方。
Young ladies, although I don’t know why you doubt our existence, the answer you are looking for may be right ahead.
Do you mean the shrine in front of us?
上面，你是说，那间神社吗？
Right ahead? You mean the shrine?
Yes, do you want to get into it and check it with us?
没错，不知汝愿不愿意和在下一起去探查一番呢？
That’s correct. I wonder if you would like to go and investigate with us?
好！那事不宜迟，我们出发吧！
Okay! Let's go without further ado!
You still love to help us, just like the old times.
浪人汝还是这么喜欢管闲事啊。
Ronin, you still like to meddle in other people's affairs.
That's also the reason for why we would like to join her.
要不是这样我们也不会跟着她一起行天下不是么？
If it weren't for that, we wouldn't be traveling around the world with her, wouldn't we?
476: I see. It happened in your memory…
原来如此，原来在汝的记忆中发生过这样的事……
So that's how it is. So something like this happened in your memory...
Do you believe it? It's weird…
你相信了？明明是这么离谱的事？
You believe me? It isn't absurd to you?
I believe you. You helped me, although we are not in the same time. It's also possible we have the different memories about this.
在下有什么不相信的理由么？虽然汝说的故事与在下记忆中的事有偏差，但那并不是不可能发生的事不是么？毕竟汝等曾穿越了时光帮助了在下。
Is there any reason for me not to believe it? Although your story differs from what I remember, it's not impossible, is it? After all, you have traveled through time to help me.
I also travel for those weird things.
多亏了这么有意思的事情我才会想要继续行遍天下呢，说不定又会碰到什么奇妙的事了。
Thanks to such interesting happenings, I want to continue traveling around the world. Maybe I will encounter something extraordinary again.
However, I haven't met any weird things this time.
但是浪人汝目前还什么都没有遇到啊。
But Ronin hasn't encountered anything yet.
What are you saying? Now the weird thing is in front of you.
妹妹说什么呢，芽衣殿下这不是遇上了么。
What are you talking about, Sister? Lady Mei has encountered this.
Mei, let's go. They speak too much.
芽衣，我们快上山吧，这些人说话这么慢吞吞的，我实在受不了了。
Mei, let's go up the mountain quickly. These people talk too formally, I really can't stand it anymore.
You go first, Kiana, I still have some other things to say with Hokushin.
那琪亚娜你先上去吧，我和北辰小姐还有些话要说。
You go up first then, Kiana. I need to discuss something with Hokushin-san.
What a smart girl… I'm curious about the time change… Do you know anything?
真是个好懂的小姑娘啊…不过我也有些好奇到底是什么缘由又让时空扭曲了，黑枫小姐，白樱小姐，你们怎么看？
What an understanding girl... But I am also a little curious about what caused the distortion of time and space again. Lady Kurokaede, Lady Shirosakura, what do you think?
Yeah, what's the reason for this? The only thing we know about is it must related to "emotion".
是啊，会是什么呢？不过有一点可以确定的是，那一定是某种非常强烈的“情感”吧。
Yes, what could it be? But one thing is certain, it must be some very strong "emotion".
477: Mei, it's just a ruin, I don't think we can find the answer there.
芽衣，这个地方都荒废了那么久，怎么可能会有什么秘密嘛，她们不会是在骗我们吧。
Mei, this place has been abandoned for so long, how could there be any secrets? Are they lying to us?
How dare you say that to Hokushin?!
How dare you be rude to Her Excellency!
Relax, Kiana, I have the feeling we must find something there.
放心吧，琪亚娜，我也隐隐有种感觉，这里有什么东西在等待着我。
Don't worry, Kiana, I also have a vague feeling that something is waiting for us here.
Stop talking, there are some people.
这里的石阶有些陡，还是小心一点为好。
These stone steps here are a bit steep, so make sure to he careful.
啧啧啧，真是温馨的家庭呢。
Ha? The kid looks like Mei, and she called herself "Mei" too~~ What a little "Mei", awesome!
咦？那个孩子长得跟芽衣好像啊，也自称芽衣呢~居然还有这么小的芽衣，真是太棒了！
Huh? That kid looks just like Mei, and she even calls herself Mei! There's actually a Mei this young! Awesome!
Father… Why he is here too… He is de… And me, the 8-year-old me…
父亲大人……为什么也会出现在这里…他不是已经…还有八岁的我……
Father... Why is he here too...? And he's... with me, when I was an eight-year-old...
咦，那个大叔是芽衣的父亲吗？这么说就是……岳父大人咯？！
Wait, so that's your father, Mei? Then... he's my future father-in-law?!
哦呀哦呀，好像有什么非常有意思的事情发生了呢~
Oh my, it seems like something very interesting has just occured~
We must figure the whole thing out.
这说不定是改变我和芽衣关系的重要一步，上天把我送到这个地方来，一定是为了促成我和芽衣结婚的！岳父大人我来了！！
This may be an important step in changing the relationship between me and Mei. God sent me to this place to facilitate my marriage with Mei! Father-in-law, here I come!!
What time is it now? Are you travelling to another time?
这里究竟是哪个时代？又或者这里其实并不是那个时间点？
What time period is this place in? Or is this not actually that time?
Kiana, let's go to check it out.
琪亚娜，我们去调查清楚吧！
478: Mei, please watch your mouth after we entering this shrine.
芽衣，等会进入神社之后一定要慎言慎行，虽然这里已经早已荒废了，但……
Mei, you must be careful with your words and actions when entering the shrine. Although this place has long been abandoned, it's still...
Who are you! I don't understand your words.
你是什么人！怎么满口胡言乱语？
Who are you?! Why are you talking nonsense?
Hello, I'm a friend of Mei. I want to marry Mei, please promise me.
岳父大人好，我是芽衣的朋友，是注定要和芽衣结婚的人，请岳父大人成全！
Hello, father-in-law. I am Mei's friend and the one destined to marry her. Please grant my blessing!
Mei's friend? Mei, do you know her?
芽衣的朋友？芽衣你认识这个人么？
Mei's friend? Mei, do you know this person?
No, I don't know her, father.
不，我不认识她，父亲大人。
简直就像是一个模子中造出来的，不过果然还是小芽衣更棒啊！！！
It's like they were made from the same mold, but my Mei is still better after all!!!
What do you want to do with my daughter?
你想对我的女儿做什么！？
What are you planning on doing to my daughter?!
Mei, give this rude person a lesson,but don't kill her.
芽衣，给这个无礼的人一点教训吧，不过不要伤到她了。
Mei, teach this rude person a lesson, but make sure not to kill her.
479: Miss, please tell your friend don't do that… Otherwise, I will give her a lesson.
小姑娘，请管管你的朋友，让她不要再来骚扰我的女儿了，否则别怪我不客气。
Young lady, please control your friend and tell her not to harass my daughter again, otherwise don't blame me for being rude.
Mei, it's not like what you think… I'm just…
芽衣，那个…不是这样的，我只是……
Mei, that's... that's not it. I just...
Wait a second… Your name is Mei? You used Hokushin Itto-ryu, it's the ougi of my family, how do you know that?
等一下……你叫芽衣？而且刚才你使用的应该也是“北辰一刀流”吧，这门剑法是我雷电家的家传绝学，你又是从何处习得的？

Wait a minute... your name is Mei? And I believe you were using "Hokushin Ittou-ryuu" just now, right? That sword technique is a family tradition passed down by clan, the Raiden family. Where did you learn it from?
Ah, it's finished. I was wondering maybe we can see a good fight…
啊啦，看来好像已经打完了，还以为能看见一场精彩的对决呢。
Ahh, it seems like the duel is over. I thought I would see an exciting showdown.
I'm just a passenger, I created "Hokushin Itto-ryu".
在下不过是一个过路人，硬要说上一种身份的话，我算是“北辰一刀流”的创始人吧。
I am just a passer-by. If I have to state an identity, you may know me as the founder of "Hokushin Ittou-ryuu".
You created it? Are you Hokushin Mei? You can't live so long.
创始人？莫非你是北辰芽衣？但是那可是战国时期出名的武士，你怎么可能活到现在？
Founder? Could you be Hokushin Mei? But she was a famous warrior from the Sengoku Period. How could you possibly be alive today?
If you are saying the truth. I still don't know the identity of the girl nearby, she looks like my daughter.
就算我姑且相信你所说的，但是你身边那位小姑娘身份也是不明不白，她又是谁？为什么和我的女儿如此相像？
Even if I believe what you said, the identity of the young woman next to you is unclear. Who is she? Why does she look so much like my daughter?
父亲……大人，父亲大人，我是芽衣啊！我……
Fa...ther, Father, it's me, Mei! I'm...
What happened to you, Mei? Do you recall anything?
芽衣你怎么了？从刚刚起你就在发呆，现在又突然喊“父亲大人”，是想起了什么吗？
Mei, what's wrong with you? You've been in a daze since a while ago, and now you're suddenly calling out "Father". Did you remember something?
That's… Kiana, I'm fine, don't worry.
刚才的那些是……琪亚娜，我没事的，不用担心。
So what happened just now was... Kiana, I'm fine, don't worry.
Humph… You still haven't told me why you want to pray here.
嗯！但是你还没有告诉我为什么会来这里参拜呢~
Alright! But you still haven't told me why you came here to pray~
芽衣你怎么了，刚才还好好的，怎么发了一会呆就变这样了……
Mei, what's wrong with you? You were fine before, why'd you start acting weird after being dazed for a while...
Nothing… About the story, maybe we can find another time… You know, it's a long story.
那个啊…真的没什么的，至于那个故事嘛…果然还是要算了吧，那个故事太长了，琪亚娜你恐怕会不耐烦的呢~
That's... it's really nothing. As for that story... just forget about it. It's too long. I'm afraid you'd be too impatient, Kiana~
好啦好啦，快上去吧。再在这里停留的话被发现我们在偷懒就不好了。
Alright, alright, let's go on ahead. If we stay here any longer, it'll be bad if we're caught slacking off.
